Name: Spider Fear
About the game: Step into a dark dank medieval dungeon where giant Spiders lay in wait to attack you. You have to quickly grab your sword and hit back before they bite you with their vicious fangs. You will have to kill all the spiders to complete the level and move on. Spider Fear is a game of attacking spiders in Virtual Reality. It is a fun action game intended to help with fear of spiders by creating an immersive environment where you fend of spiders attacking. The game is very immersive, it may induce fright. Your VR controllers allow you to use your hands and grab a sword to defend against the spider attacks.
